body:

title: Show your Retro Consoles!

replies.body:
I sold them, but I used to have an NES, Atari 2600 junior and a Sega Genesis/MegaDrive

Also for the PAL DC, the squiggle is blue?

replies.body: The oldest thing I had is an iPod Touch 4, I never really played video games till like 5 years ago.
replies.body_tagged: The oldest thing I had is an iPod Touch 4, I never really played video games till like 5 years ago.

replies.body: Nintendo 64, SNES, Atari 7800, Atari 2600, PS1, and (bonus) Game Boy Advance SP.
replies.body_tagged: Nintendo 64, SNES, Atari 7800, Atari 2600, PS1, and (bonus) Game Boy Advance SP.

replies.body: My mum and dad used to own a shop which sold things from the 1950s-1990s, so they used to bring home NESs and other old consoles every now and again which I would play.
replies.body_tagged: My mum and dad used to own a shop which sold things from the 1950s-1990s, so they used to bring home NESs and other old consoles every now and again which I would play.
